dandy.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a man who spends a lot of time and money on his clothes and appearance
dandy.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: very good – often used in a slightly humorous way
dandy.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: We’re at our hotel, and everything is fine and dandy.
dandy.translation[2].definitions[0].defi: a British comic (=a magazine for children that tells stories using sets of drawings), whose best-known character is Desperate Dan
